title: Which country should be best for starting a tech startup? - Quora

response.answer_text: India. I would say India as if you have the right product you can hit the market in mass, very heavy mass. Returns would also be high. On another note if you have some usability software, you would be having all type of segment like starting from small size market upto large market to sell and promote the technology. Other countries are US, European countries, Singapore .7 best new global cities for startups Hope you got some way to start. Good luck.
